description:
A rugged, dunk-proof bag for touring paddlers or anyone who needs to keep their gear dry. The handles function as anchor points so the Slogg can be lashed securely onto canoes, SUPs and rafts. Padded hipbelt and shoulder straps help make uphill portages more bearable. Holds enough dry clothes and gear for a minimalist weekend, or keeps a wetsuit from drenching the rest of your stuff.

  • Fabric is 840-denier, high-tenacity nylon, coated on both sides with PVC-free polyurethane
  • All seams are radio-frequency welded to seal out water
  • Stiffened roll closures are highly water-resistant though not fully waterproof
  • Removable hipbelt lets you carry larger loads
  • Shoulder straps are breathable and quick-drying perforated foam
name: MEC Slogg 35L Dry Pack - Unisex
